case_studies_home.heading: Trusted across regulated industries
case_studies_home.intro: See how organizations use AKIOS to integrate AI securely and stay compliant — from healthcare to government.
case_studies_home.industry_healthcare_desc: HIPAA-compliant PII redaction and audit trails for patient data processed by AI agents. EU AI Act high-risk ready.
case_studies_home.industry_banking_desc: Sandboxed AI workflows for transaction fraud detection under GLBA, SOX, and BSA/AML compliance controls.
case_studies_home.industry_accounting_desc: Secure document processing and financial data extraction under SOX and PCAOB audit controls.
case_studies_home.industry_legal_desc: Privilege-preserving contract review and document analysis with complete network isolation and audit trails.
case_studies_home.industry_gov_desc: Air-gapped, auditable AI deployments meeting FedRAMP, NIST 800-53, and FISMA data sovereignty requirements.
case_studies_home.industry_insurance_desc: Sandboxed AI for claims processing with PII redaction, fraud detection, and NAIC-compliant audit trails.
case_studies_home.industry_pharma_desc: AI-powered clinical trial analysis under FDA 21 CFR Part 11, HIPAA, and GCP controls with full reproducibility.
case_studies_home.industry_energy_desc: OT-isolated AI for grid anomaly detection under NERC CIP with zero control-system access and complete audit trails.
